tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MonthlyFinancialReports (
    report_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    month VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    year INTEGER NOT NULL,
    total_revenue DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    net_income DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name TEXT,
 report_date DATE,
 total_income DECIMAL,
 total_expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    month VARCHAR(20),
    year INT,
    total_revenue DECIMAL,
    total_expenses DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE revenue_details (
    revenue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES financial_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE expense_details (
    expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    category VARCHAR(50),
    amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES financial_reports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonthlyReports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_date DATE,
 total_income DECIMAL,
 total_expenses DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE IncomeDetails (
 income_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 income_date DATE,
 amount DECIMAL,
 category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ExpenseDetails (
 expense_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 expense_date DATE,
 amount DECIMAL,
 category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeSalaries (
 employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 employee_name VARCHAR(50),
 salary DECIMAL,
 department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE DepartmentBudget (
 department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 department_name VARCHAR(50),
 total_budget DECIMAL
)
